Sentencas: BACKGROUND: A high H2S elimination capacity has been achieved by anoxic biotrickling filters but accurate control of the nitrate dosage is required.
Titulo: PID control system for biogas desulfurization under anoxic conditions

Sentencas: Different control strategies have been used in biotrickling filters but proportional-integral-derivative (PID) control studies have not been reported to date.
Titulo: PID control system for biogas desulfurization under anoxic conditions

Sentencas: The aim of this study was to demonstrate the stability and robustness of PID control in an anoxic biotrickling filter.
Titulo: PID control system for biogas desulfurization under anoxic conditions

Sentencas: RESULTS: Three PID tuning methods were tested: Ziegler-Nichols, Approximate M-constrained integral gain optimization (AMIGO), and maintained oscillation.
Titulo: PID control system for biogas desulfurization under anoxic conditions

Sentencas: The best results were obtained using PID control by the maintained oscillation method, where the system reached stabilization 0.41 h after the H2S inlet step.
Titulo: PID control system for biogas desulfurization under anoxic conditions

Sentencas: Moreover, the nitrate consumptionwas 15.4% lower than that without control.
Titulo: PID control system for biogas desulfurization under anoxic conditions
PID control system for biogas desulfurization under anoxic conditions

Sentencas: The biotrickling filter operated with a PID control strategy proved to be highly stable and robust against the perturbations and disturbances evaluated.
Titulo: PID control system for biogas desulfurization under anoxic conditions

Sentencas: The control system was able to operate satisfactorily to a change in the set-point of the outlet H2S concentrations from 25 to 200 ppmV.
Titulo: PID control system for biogas desulfurization under anoxic conditions

Sentencas: The desulfurized biogas could be fed directly to an internal combustion engine or solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) equipped with a zeolite clean unit.
Titulo: PID control system for biogas desulfurization under anoxic conditions
